metadata.title: CVE-2020-27507 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
The Kamailio SIP before 5.5.0 server mishandles INVITE requests withduplicated fields and overlength tag, leading to a buffer overflow thatcrashes the server or possibly have unspecified other impact.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-27507` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

kamailio - 4.3.4-1.1ubuntu2.1+esm1
kamailio-autheph-modules - 4.3.4-1.1ubuntu2.1+esm1
kamailio-berkeley-bin - 4.3.4-1.1ubuntu2.1+esm1
kamailio-berkeley-modules - 4.3.4-1.1ubuntu2.1+esm1

criterions.comment: kamailio package in esm-apps/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.3.4-1.1ubuntu2.1+esm1').
